cloud.jgo.net.tcp.http

Class HTTPServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • cloud.jgo.net.tcp.TCPServer
      • cloud.jgo.net.tcp.http.HTTPServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Manageable, Server, ManageableCommands, java.lang.Iterable<Handler>, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultHTTPServer, JORServer

    public class HTTPServer
extends TCPServer
    Author:
    Martire91
    This class represents a simple http server, and is a subclass of TCPServer
